About


Vinegar.JS - A Simple Robust Javascript Template Engine

About

Vinegar.JS is a javascript template engine built for speed. It is an easy-to-use template engine desined to reduce server-side load by incorporating JSON templates to load and replace data in real-time on the client. For more information see the documentation.
